name: Pegglelike
description:
Turn based prototype mix between Peggle and Roguelike, where strength of your hero actions depends on how good you are doing at Peggle.

This version is very limited, non responsive and buggy, due to my time constraints during jam, but hopefully you will enjoy it. 

Purple pegs are critical hit pegs, they double currently gathered value. After winning three chests will appear, shoot one of them with your ball to get the reward. 

Made for 2020 Mix and Jam, with theme "Mixing genres".
